newsitem.title: FRANCE: Pechiney to sell Metaux Speciaux unit.
newsitem.headline: Pechiney to sell Metaux Speciaux unit.

text.p: French aluminium group Pechiney said on Thursday that it had signed a letter of intent to sell its Metaux Speciaux SA unit to holding company International Alkaline for an undisclosed amount.

Pechiney said in a statement that International Alkaline regrouped Metaux Speciaux managers and three financial investors, SPEF, of the Banques Populaires group, Parcom Ventures BV of Dutch group ING and Hambro European Ventures Ltd.

Metaux Speciaux SA produces sodium mainly for chemical applications and is part of Pechiney Electrometallurgie. It generates sales of 205 million francs from its Plombiere-Saint-Marcel plant near Albertville in the French Alps.
